#topic Kernel WG Update (TheCharlatan)
heh
As shared the last few meetings, the discussion around scope and C vs C++ API in the PR are still ongoing.
I re-wrote the current pull request (#30595) to instead first expose a C++ API header: https://github.com/TheCharlatan/bitcoin/tree/kernelApi_Cpp
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/30595 | kernel: Introduce initial C header API by TheCharlatan · Pull Request #30595 · bitcoin/bitcoin · GitHub
The current PR basically exposes code from our code -> C API -> C++ API.
The re-write flips this relationship from our code -> C++ API -> C API.
This would make it easy to split out the C API into a separate repository under the bitcoin-core organization.
that's all :)
